• Documentation

WFScroll Demo

JavaScript plugin

Elevate your website’s visual appeal with our WFScroll plugin, a cutting-edge solution crafted entirely in pure Javascript. This plugin adds a dynamic and engaging element to your web pages by seamlessly animating blocks as users scroll, creating an interactive and captivating user experience.

Plugin benefits:

  • Plugin weight - javascript/css - 7,5 KB

FadeIn and slide bottom

Usage example - data-animate="opacity:0;translateY:-100%;"

FadeIn and slide top

Usage example - data-animate="opacity:0;translateY:100%;"

FadeIn and slide left

Usage example - data-animate="opacity:0;translateX:100%;"

FadeIn and slide right

Usage example - data-animate="opacity:0;translateX:-100%;"

FadeIn and Flip vertical

Usage example - data-animate="opacity:0;rotateX:360;"

FadeIn and Flip horizontal

Usage example - data-animate="opacity:0;rotateY:360;"

FadeIn and Slide right and skewX

Usage example - data-animate="opacity:0;translateX:-100%;skewX:100;"

FadeIn and Slide left and skewY

Usage example - data-animate="opacity:0;translateX:100%;skewY:100;"

FadeIn and skewY

Usage example - data-animate="opacity:0;skewY:100"

FadeIn and Scale

Usage example - data-animate="opacity:0;scale:0;"
data-animate opacity:0;
rotate3d:-1, 1, 0, 180deg;
transformOrigin:100% 100%;
data-animate opacity:0;
transformOrigin:top;
rotateX:180;
data-animate opacity:0;
transformOrigin:100% 0%;
rotate3d:1, 1, 0, 180deg;
data-animate opacity:0;
rotate3d:1, 1, 0, 80deg;
data-animate opacity:0;
transformOrigin:0% 50%;
translateX:100%;
translateZ:-260px;
rotateY:180;
data-animate opacity:0;
translateY:100%;
translateZ:160px;
rotateX:180;
blur:10px
